statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_type, TIMESTAMP FROM equipment_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM equipment_sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) as average_value FROM equipment_sensor_data GROUP BY equipment_id, sensor_type
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) as sensor_count FROM equipment_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY sensor_count DESC
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 100 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT equipment_id, MAX(sensor_value) as max_value FROM equipment_sensor_data GROUP BY equipment_id
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM Equipment_Sensor_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value FROM Equipment_Sensor_Data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature'
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM Equipment_Sensor_Data WHERE sensor_value > 50
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Log ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT log_id, equipment_id, maintenance_description FROM Maintenance_Log WHERE equipment_id = 3
SELECT * FROM Equipment_Sensor_Data ORDER BY equipment_id ASC, sensor_type DESC, timestamp
SELECT MAX(sensor_value), MIN(sensor_value) FROM Equipment_Sensor_Data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' GROUP BY sensor_type
SELECT equipment_id, SUM(sensor_value) AS total_value FROM Equipment_Sensor_Data GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING total_value > 1000

SELECT equipment_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM Equipment_Sensor_Data JOIN Maintenance_Log ON Equipment_Sensor_Data.equipment_id = Maintenance_Log.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(equipment_id) AS total_equipment, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM Equipment_Sensor_Data GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY avg_value DESC
SELECT * FROM Equipment_Sensors
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_name FROM Equipment_Sensors ORDER BY equipment_id DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, last_reading FROM Equipment_Sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT equipment_id, downtime_start, downtime_end, reason FROM Downtime_Records WHERE equipment_id = 3 AND downtime_end > '2022-05-01'
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type FROM Maintenance_Schedule ORDER BY maintenance_type
SELECT * FROM Equipment_Sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC, last_reading DESC
SELECT sensor_name, last_reading FROM Equipment_Sensors WHERE equipment_id = 3 ORDER BY last_reading ASC
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_id, sensor_name FROM Equipment_Sensors WHERE sensor_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM Downtime_Records WHERE reason LIKE '%maintenance%'
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, scheduled_date FROM Maintenance_Schedule WHERE scheduled_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY scheduled_date
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Computer';
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturing_date FROM equipment ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 100;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_value > 100.0;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturing_date FROM equipment ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_logs ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment_sensor_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_id, sensor_reading FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE sensor_reading > 100;
SELECT equipment_id, reading_timestamp, location FROM equipment_sensor_data ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE equipment_id = 100 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, parameter_name, threshold_value FROM sensor_thresholds;
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_reading, reading_timestamp FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE sensor_reading > 100 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT m.equipment_id, m.maintenance_type, m.maintenance_date, e.location FROM maintenance_logs m JOIN equipment_sensor_data e ON m.equipment_id = e.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_type LIKE '%repair%' ORDER BY m.maintenance_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT equipment_id, downtime_start, downtime_end, downtime_reason FROM downtime_records WHERE downtime_reason NOT LIKE '%scheduled%' ORDER BY downtime_start DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT s.parameter_name, s.threshold_value, e.location FROM sensor_thresholds s JOIN equipment_sensor_data e ON s.sensor_id = e.sensor_id WHERE s.threshold_value < 50 ORDER BY s.threshold_value ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT equipment_id, last_maintenance_date, suggested_maintenance_date, maintenance_required FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_required = TRUE ORDER BY suggested_maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5
